mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.articletitle AS "articletitle", a.articleSubtitle AS "articleSubtitle", a.artclepic AS "artclepic", a.author AS "author", a.creator AS "creator", a.source AS "source", a.articlecolumn AS "articlecolumn", a.keyword AS "keyword", a.articleDigest AS "articleDigest", a.topstatus AS "topstatus", a.articlecnt AS "articlecnt", a.status AS "status", a.releasetime AS "releasetime", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select: SELECT FROM content_article a where a.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO content_article( id, articletitle, articleSubtitle, artclepic, author, creator, source, articlecolumn, keyword, articleDigest, articlecnt, releasetime, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{articletitle}, #{articleSubtitle}, #{artclepic}, #{author}, #{creator}, #{source}, #{articlecolumn}, #{keyword}, #{articleDigest}, #{articlecnt}, #{releasetime}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE content_article SET articletitle = #{articletitle}, articleSubtitle = #{articleSubtitle}, artclepic = #{artclepic}, author = #{author}, creator=#{creator}, source = #{source}, articlecolumn = #{articlecolumn}, keyword = #{keyword}, articleDigest = #{articleDigest}, articlecnt = #{articlecnt}, topstatus = #{topstatus}, releasetime = #{releasetime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
